name: Tasks to combine everything we know

0.name: Select the correct option for finding the length of the names array.

1.name: Select the correct option for finding the second element of the names array

2.name: What are the indexOf(), lastIndexOf(), and includes() methods used in arrays?

0.name: These methods allow you to change the elements in an array

1.name: These methods allow you to find out if an element exists in the array

2.name: These methods allow you to find out the length of the array

3.name: Choose the correct option to change the element 'birds' to 'fish' in the animals array

4.name: What does the following code return?

5.name: Select the correct option to add an element to the array

6.name: What happens when an element is added to the beginning of an array with unshift()?

0.name: The length of the array will increase by the number of elements added and the element indices will be overwritten

1.name: The length of the array will increase by the number of elements added, but the element indices will not change

2.name: The length and indexes of the array elements will not change

3.name: The length of the array will be decreased by the number of elements added and the element indices will be rewritten

7.name: Choose the correct option to remove an element from the array

8.name: What does the splice() method do?

0.name: Changes the contents of an array by deleting existing elements and/or adding new elements

1.name: Only adds new elements to the array

2.name: Only removes elements from the array

3.name: Only replaces elements in the array

9.name: Select the correct option for deep copying of an array
